  // adc-status

  always @(posedge l_clk) begin
    if (rx_valid == 1'b1) begin
      if (rx_frame_d == rx_frame_d_s) begin
        adc_status_p <= rx_locked;
      end else begin
        adc_status_p <= 1'b0;
      end
    end
  end
